show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: Prosocial Education
content:
My guest Michael W. <!--more--> Corrigan EdD is an enormously experienced psychologist and educator who has worked for decades promoting more positive “prosocial” education.
 We discuss everything from the flaws of international testing that rank American education too low to what children really need which is… their parents!
A frontier in education show with lots of information on ADHD and better approaches to helping children.
